    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Mlinsko kolo</string>
            <string language="en">Mill wheel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tausendstelrad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roue de moulin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roda do moinho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rotella del laminatoio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρόδα μύλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rueda del molino</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Mlinsko kolo z rečne strani proti obrežju. Kolo je se vrti med dvema čolnoma na reki Muri v Veržeju.</string>
            <string language="en">Mill wheel on a river placed on two boats. Location: river Mura, Veržej, Slovenia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vodno kolo</string>
            <string language="en">water wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">reka</string>
            <string language="en">river</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mlin</string>
            <string language="en">mill</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prägen Sie Rad auf einem Fluß, der auf zwei 
Boote plaziert wird. Standort: Fluß Mura, Ver?ej, 
Slowenien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fraisez la roue sur un fleuve placé sur deux 
bateaux. Emplacement : fleuve Mura, Ver?ej, Slovénie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moa a roda em um rio colocado em dois barcos. 
Posição: rio Mura, Ver?ej, Slovenia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Macini la rotella su un fiume disposto su due 
barche. Posizione: fiume Mura, Ver?ej, Slovenia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρόδα μύλων σε έναν ποταμό που τοποθετείται σε δύο 
βάρκες. Θέση: ποταμός mura, Ver?ej, Σλοβενία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Muela la rueda en un río colocado en dos barcos.
Localización: río Mura, Ver?ej, Eslovenia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tausendstel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
